targets.query:
from(bucket: "ouroboros-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ouroboros_broadcast_ipcps_total" or r["_measurement"] == "ouroboros_eth-dix_ipcps_total" or r["_measurement"] == "ouroboros_eth-llc_ipcps_total" or r["_measurement"] == "ouroboros_local_ipcps_total" or r["_measurement"] == "ouroboros_udp_ipcps_total" or r["_measurement"] == "ouroboros_unicast_ipcps_total" or r["_measurement"] == "ouroboros_unknown_ipcps_total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ipcps")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["system"], set: ${_system:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["type"], set: ${_type:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${_interval}, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "ouroboros-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ouroboros_flow_allocator_flows_total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "flows")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["ipcp"], set: ${_ipcp:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["system"], set: ${_system:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["layer"], set: ${_layer:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${_interval}, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "ouroboros-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ouroboros_lsdb_neighbors_total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "neighbors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["system"], set: ${_system:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["layer"], set: ${_layer:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${_interval}, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "ouroboros-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ouroboros_lsdb_nodes_total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "nodes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["system"], set: ${_system:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["layer"], set: ${_layer:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${_interval}, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "ouroboros-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ouroboros_lsdb_links_total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "links")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["system"], set: ${_system:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["layer"], set: ${_layer:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${_interval}, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "ouroboros-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "n_rxm")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["system"], set: ${_system:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "ouroboros-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "srtt_ns")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["system"], set: ${_system:json}))

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "mdev_ns")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["system"], set: ${_system:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "ouroboros-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "mpl_timer_ns")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["system"], set: ${_system:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "ouroboros-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "r_timer_ns")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["system"], set: ${_system:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "ouroboros-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "a_timer_ns")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["system"], set: ${_system:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

t1 = from(bucket: "ouroboros-metrics") 
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ouroboros_process_frct_snd_lwe")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "snd_lwe")

t2 = from(bucket: "ouroboros-metrics") 
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ouroboros_process_frct_snd_rwe")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "snd_rwe")

join(tables: {t1: t1, t2: t2}, on: ["_time", "process", "flow_descriptor", "system"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value_t2 - r._value_t1 }))
  |> drop(columns: ["_value_t1", "_value_t2"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "ouroboros-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ouroboros_process_frct_snd_lwe")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "snd_lwe")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["system"], set: ${_system:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "ouroboros-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "snd_rwe")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["system"], set: ${_system:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "ouroboros-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "snd_seqno")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["system"], set: ${_system:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

t1 = from(bucket: "ouroboros-metrics") 
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ouroboros_process_frct_rcv_lwe")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "rcv_lwe")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["system"], set: ${_system:json}))

panels.title: Packets received outside of reorder queue

targets.query:
from(bucket: "ouroboros-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "n_rdv")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["system"], set: ${_system:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "ouroboros-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ouroboros_flow_allocator_sent_bytes_total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "sent_bytes_total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["ipcp"], set: ${_ipcp:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["system"], set: ${_system:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["layer"], set: ${_layer:json}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value) * 8.0}))
  |> derivative(unit: 1s)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${_interval}, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "ouroboros-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

from(bucket: "ouroboros-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ouroboros_flow_allocator_down_pkt_ctr")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "down_pkt_ctr")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["ipcp"], set: ${_ipcp:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["system"], set: ${_system:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["layer"], set: ${_layer:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${_interval}, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

t1 = from(bucket: "ouroboros-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ouroboros_flow_allocator_cong_wnd_size_bytes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "cong_wnd_size_bytes")

t2 = from(bucket: "ouroboros-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ouroboros_flow_allocator_cong_wnd_width_ns")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "cong_wnd_width_ns")

join(tables: {t1: t1, t2: t2}, on: ["_time", "ipcp", "flow_id", "layer", "system"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value_t1) / float(v: r._value_t2) * 1000000000.0}))
  |> drop(columns: ["_value_t1", "_value_t2"])
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["ipcp"], set: ${_ipcp:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["system"], set: ${_system:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["layer"], set: ${_layer:json}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value) * 8.0}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "ouroboros-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ouroboros_data_transfer_sent_bytes_total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["endpoint"] == "dht")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["qos_cube"] == "QoS cube 0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["ipcp"], set: ${_ipcp:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["system"], set: ${_system:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["layer"], set: ${_layer:json}))
  |> derivative(unit: 1s)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/v1"

v1.tagValues(
  bucket: "ouroboros-metrics",
  tag: "system",
  predicate: (r) => true,
  start: -5d
)
list.label: System
list.name: _system
